item.title: Bolsonaro Convicted of Attempting a Coup in Brazil
item.description: Brazil’s Supreme Court convicted the former president of trying to cling to power after losing the 2022 election, in a plot that included killing his ...

item.title: Carney Unveils Major Projects for Canada to Offset Damage of Trump’s Tariffs
item.description: Prime Minister Mark Carney unveiled big infrastructure plans. But they are likely to meet resistance from Indigenous and environmental groups.

item.title: Brazil’s Supreme Court Is On Course to Convict Bolsonaro in Coup Plot
item.description: A majority of voting justices said they plan to vote to convict Brazil’s former president of trying to hold onto power. A final verdict could come Thu...

item.title: Drone Barrage Over Poland Was a Test for NATO, and the U.S.
item.description: A continent already on edge over the Ukraine war sees a Russian challenge to NATO readiness and to an America that wants to disengage from Europe.

item.title: U.K. Ambassador to U.S., Peter Mandelson, Fired Over Epstein Links
item.description: The British government said it withdrew the envoy after newly revealed emails showed the depth of his relationship with Jeffrey Epstein.
